#summary Here you can find all the custom filters and actions in use in the last version of the plugin

= Filters =

Single items
  * *ffff_content ($content, $post)*. Filter the content of every item. The post object is passed as second parameter for advanced customization. 
  * *ffff_title ($title, $post)*. Filter the title of every item. The post object is passed as second parameter for advanced customization. 

Digest posts
  * *ffff_digest_title ($title, $digest_post)*. Filter the title of every digest post. The post object is passed as second parameter for advanced customization. 
  * *ffff_digest_content ($content, $digest_post)*. Filter the content of digests. The post object is passed as second parameter for advanced customization.
